records query errors including host and username

Source IP - Source Host Name - Logon User Name
Current logged-on User Name - Alternate User Name - Destination Host Name/IP - Process Name

Description: A handle to an object was requested
A handle to an object was closed
An operation was performed on an object.
ForensicValue: Account Name - Accessed AD Object - Operation Type - Access Info
Comment: Answers for: Who performed the operation? Which AD object was accessed? What operation was performed?; 4662 alone does NOT mean modification — only that an operation occurred. 5136 and others confirm modification.

Description: An attempt was made to access an object.
ForensicValue: User Name - Object Name (FilePath; RegPath etc.) - Process Name - Access Operation
Comment: Answers for: Who accesed the object? What object was accessed? (File; RegKey etc.) What operation was attempted? (Read; Write; Delete etc.) Which process is responsible?

ForensicValue: User Name - Object Name - Old/New ACL
Comment: Answers for: Who altered permissions? Which objects permissions? What is the old ACL and new ACL?

ForensicValue: Logon User Name - Logon by user with administrative rights
